description.addFace: Walk through adding a new face to the Face Library.

details.faceDesc: Details for the face and associated object

uploadFaceImage.title: Upload Face Image
uploadFaceImage.desc: Upload an image to scan for faces and include for {{pageToggle}}

createFaceLibrary.title: Create Face Library
createFaceLibrary.nextSteps: It is recommended to use the Train tab to select and train images for each person as they are detected. When building a strong foundation it is strongly recommended to only train on images that are straight-on. Ignore images from cameras that recognize faces from an angle.

readTheDocs: Read the documentation to view more details on refining images for the Face Library

success.addFaceLibrary: {{name}} has successfully been added to the Face Library!
